title: Vector Partial-Success Result
description: Result payload for transport-level partial success (code=PARTIAL_SUCCESS) per ยง23.4. Captures per-item outcomes for batch operations with stable, machine-actionable fields.

successes.description: Number of successful items (MUST be >= 1 for PARTIAL_SUCCESS).

failures.description: Number of failed items (MUST be >= 1 for PARTIAL_SUCCESS).

items.description: Per-item outcomes in the same order as input.

index.description: Zero-based index into the original request batch.

ok.description: True if this item succeeded; false if it failed.

result.description: Present when ok=true: the result for this item.

code.description: Present when ok=false: normalized error code.

message.description: Present when ok=false: human-readable, SIEM-safe summary.

details.description: Optional, SIEM-safe structured context for failures.
